com.storytron.enginecommon

Class ScaledImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.storytron.enginecommon.ScaledImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ScaledImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Class for manipulating scaled images.

    Scaling operations are not applied directly on the images, but the operation is recorded so it is conveniently applied when invoking the getBufferedImage() method.

    The method applyScaling() actually writes a new image. This is useful to avoid using memory for a big image that will be shown shrunk.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScaledImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Creates a scaled image from an image.
